info.name: Solarmovie kuroi
info.description:
This is a simple and slick looking black&green skin for solarmovie.is (formerly known as solarmovie.so).
It is matrix inspired and contains many shades of green.
info.additionalInfo:
Solarmovie is in my opinion the best website for streaming movies and series online. I have always found what I was looking for so it's your best bet if you're looking for any new streaming material even if it's not that well known. 
"Dif tor heh smusma"
